TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TempFileCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable
Public Class TempFileCollection Implements ICollection, IDisposable
public ref class TempFileCollection : IDisposable, System::Collections::ICollection
type TempFileCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示临时文件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of temporary files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于生成唯一的文件名并跟踪文件列表。 can be used to generate unique file names and to keep track of a list of files. 这对于管理编译器生成的中间文件的列表 (有时在使用后会被删除) 很有用。This can be useful to implementers when managing a list of compiler-generated intermediate files, which are sometimes deleted after use. 若要在中指定一个目录以生成唯一的临时文件名, 请使用适当的重载构造函数。To specify a directory to generate unique temporary file names in, use an appropriately overloaded constructor. 你还可以使用构造函数重载来指示在释放 集合或调用方法时是否应删除添加到集合的文件 ( 如果未指定, 如果使用或方法)。You can also use a constructor overload to indicate whether files added to the collection should, if not specified otherwise when using the or methods, be deleted when the collection is disposed or the method is called. 使用方法可以将任何目录中的文件添加到的实例中。A file in any directory can be added to an instance of using the method. 若要为特定文件扩展名的临时文件生成唯一名称, 请调用并指定要生成的文件名的扩展名。To generate a unique name for a temporary file of a particular file extension, call and specify the extension of the file name to generate. 方法将返回一个字符串, 该字符串由属性指定的目录中指定扩展名的文件名的完整路径组成。 The method will return a string consisting of a full path to a file name of the specified extension in the directory specified by the property. 方法只为每个文件扩展名返回一个唯一的文件名。The method will only return one unique file name per file name extension. 和方法都具有重载, 可用于指定在释放集合或调用方法时是否应删除文件。 Both the and methods have overloads that allow you to specify whether the files should be deleted when the collection is disposed or the method is called. 方法将删除该集合中的所有文件, 但标记为的文件除外。The method will delete all the files in the collection except those that are marked to be kept. 属性指示基文件名的完整路径, 没有文件扩展名, 用于生成方法返回的文件名。 The property indicates a full path to the base file name, without a file name extension, used to generate the file names returned by the method. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含应用于所有成员的类级别的链接要求和继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方或派生类不具有完全信任权限时,将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息, 请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类和和方法。The following example shows the use of the class and the and methods. [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection/VB/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个无参数的构造函数, 它使用默认设置来初始化集合。This is a parameterless constructor that initializes the collection with default settings. 默认情况下, 此临时文件集合会将这些文件存储在默认的临时目录中, 并将在生成并使用临时文件后将其删除。By default, this temporary files collection will store the files in a default temporary directory and will delete the temporary files after they have been generated and used.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified temporary directory that is set to delete the temporary files after their generation and use, by default.

Public Sub New (tempDir As String, keepFiles As Boolean)

span.span: A path to the temporary directory to use for storing the temporary files.

param.name: keepFiles
param.span: 如果使用临时文件后应保留它们，则为 ；如果应删除临时文件，则为 。

span.span: if the temporary files should be kept after use; if the temporary files should be deleted.

summary.span: 使用指定的临时目录和指定的值初始化 类的新实例，该值指示默认情况下生成并使用临时文件后是保留这些文件还是将它们删除。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified temporary directory and specified value indicating whether to keep or delete the temporary files after their generation and use, by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值`keepFiles`用于设置参数。The value of `keepFiles` is used to set the parameter. 在编译器活动完成后, 将根据集合中属性的值保留或删除集合中的临时文件。The temporary files in the collection are retained or deleted upon the completion of compiler activity based on the value of the property in the collection. 将每个文件添加到集合中后, 的当前值将与其关联, 除非它是使用`keepFile`具有参数的方法添加的, 在这种情况下, 该值用于该特定文件。As each file is added to the collection, the current value of is associated with it, unless it is added with a method that has a `keepFile` parameter, in which case that value is used for that specific file. `true` `true`当调用方法时, 如果为, 则将删除所有文件, 包括添加了值为的文件。When the method is called, if is `true`, all files are deleted, including those added with a value of `true`. 这允许在编译后暂时保留特定文件 (这些文件被标识为保留文件), 以便进行错误报告, 然后在不再需要时删除。This allows specific files, those identified as being keep files, to be temporarily retained after compilation for purposes such as error reporting, then deleted when they are no longer needed.

span.span: Adds a file name with the specified file name extension to the collection.

param.name: fileExtension
param.span: 要添加到集合中的自动生成的临时文件的文件扩展名。

summary.span: 将具有指定文件扩展名的文件名添加到集合中。

returns.span: 刚添加到集合中的具有指定扩展名的文件名。

span.span: A file name with the specified extension that was just added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回具有已添加到临时文件集合中的指定扩展名的文件名。This method returns a file name with the specified extension that has been added to the temporary files collection. 其他代码仍必须创建文件, 然后才能使用。Other code must still create the file before it can be used. 对于每个文件扩展名, 只能调用一次此方法, 这是因为如果用相同的扩展名调用此方法, 它将返回相同的名称。This method can be called only once for each file name extension, because it will return the same name if it is called with the same extension.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Delete() cil managed

summary.span: 删除此集合中没有标记为保留的临时文件。

span.span: Deletes the temporary files within this collection that were not marked to be kept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会检查集合中的每个文件, 以逐个确定是否要保留或删除该文件。The method examines each file in the collection to determine, on an individual basis, whether the file is to be kept or deleted. 使用采用`keepFile`参数的 add 方法将文件添加到集合时, 可以将文件显式标记为保留。Files can be explicitly marked to be kept when added to the collection using add methods that take a `keepFile` parameter. 使用 `keepFile` 没有参数的重载向集合添加文件时, 属性的值将用作默认的 "保留文件" 指示器。When adding a file to the collection using the overload that does not have a `keepFile` parameter the value of the property is used as the default keep file indicator.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法, `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在`Dispose` 设置`disposing` 为`false`的情况调用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息, 请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
Implementing a Dispose method
Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在垃圾回收收回此对象之前尝试删除这些临时文件。

span.span: Attempts to delete the temporary files before this object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过调用`Dispose(false)`重写并清理资源。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 重写 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自定义清理。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 应用程序代码不应调用此方法;在垃圾回收`Finalize`过程中会自动调用对象的方法, 除非已通过调用方法禁用了垃圾回收器终止。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))、[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示默认情况下在调用 方法或释放集合时是否保留这些文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to keep the files, by default, when the method is called or the collection is disposed.

value.span: 如果应保留文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the files should be kept; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有`keepFile`参数的 重载将调用以将临时文件添加到集合中,则属性的值将用作默认值。The value of the property is used as the default value when the overload that does not have a `keepFile` parameter is called to add a temporary file to the collection. 集合中的每个临时文件都有一个关联的 "保留文件" 标志, 该标志根据每个文件确定是否要保留或删除该文件。Each temporary file in the collection has an associated keep file flag that determines, on a per-file basis, whether that file is to be kept or deleted. 编译完成后, 会根据其关联的 "保留文件" 值自动保留或删除文件。Files are automatically kept or deleted on completion of the compilation based on their associated keep files value. 但是, 编译完成后, 可以通过设置 false 并调用方法来释放保留的文件。However, after compilation is complete, files that were kept can be released by setting false and calling the method. 这将导致删除所有文件。This will result in all files being deleted.
